code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import ActivityCard from"./activityCard";import YogaIcon from'./yoga.png';import GymIcon from'./gym.png';import DanceIcon from'./dance.png';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./home.css';import ClassesTable from"./table";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Home(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[classes,setClasses]=useState([]);const getClasses=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('https://fitness-booking-backend-production.up.railway.app/classes',{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});const result=await response.json();console.log(result);if(result.status){setClasses(result.classes);}}catch(error){console.error('Error while getting classes:',error);}};const handleLogout=()=>{navigate('/');};useEffect(()=>{getClasses();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-container",children:classes.map(activity=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ActivityCard,{name:activity.type,slotsAvailable:activity.slotsAvailable,waitlistNumber:activity.waitlistNumber,bookedIds:activity.bookedIds,waitlistIds:activity.waitlistIds,timing:activity.timing,icon:activity.type==="Yoga"?YogaIcon:activity.type==="Gym"?GymIcon:DanceIcon,getClasses:()=>getClasses()},activity.type);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tableHeader",children:"Users Classes Overview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClassesTable,{classes:classes})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:'logout',children:"Logout"})]});}
